Dear Mr* Underwood:
Thank you so very much for your most prompt response to
ray letter of January 10th* I, in turn, hasten to accept
the offer of your apology made in your letter of January
13th*
Together with Purdue, we will complete the forms you
requested and return them with copies of our fifteen
minute series, in the very near future#
In the meantime, since you are not interested in our
ten minute series, would you kindly return the audition
tape*
Thank you for your interest in our project and be assured
that you shall be hearing from us by the 1st of February*
FJS:lf
